mn128:7.4: udakañca pādānaṁ dhovanaṁ → udakañca pādānaṁ (bj, cck, sya1ed, km, pts1ed)
mn128:8.1: kimilo → kimbilo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, km, pts1ed); kimmilo (cck)
